name: Housewarming Trashing
description:
POV:  It's monday and you're a bit late to the office because your dog shat all over the carpet just before you left home. You come to the office only to find out that no one cleaned up the mess from the housewarming party, also because of the dog shitting, you're so late that you only have 2 minutes till a customer meeting ringing. Get read y to sort and fight through the mess!!!!!

Only tested on Oculus devices.
